item.description:
Contact - Bill James
Cell/text - 603.557.6055

Hi all,
Short notice again, but I just firmed up a plan to go ride at Sunapee tomorrow and thought I would put it out for anyone else who is gung-ho enough to make last minute riding plans too.

I have two other riders meeting there already - one riding up from Nashua with me, the other coming from central NH. If you can get up to the Nashua park-and-ride (exit 6 on Rt3), you're welcome to pile in with us and share the ride. Will need to meet us at that lot around 7am - let me know in advance!

Planning on meeting at the Sunapee Lodge at 9am and heading out as a group. Expecting to ride all day and hang out til the lifts close before we pack it in and head south again.
I'm an intermediate rider, as is one of the others. One beginner level rider is coming up and she'll be taking lessons.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a high-visibility orange stocking hat on in the lodge
item.name: Snowboarding at Mount Sunapee
